articles.author: Matt Spetalnick, Steve Holland
articles.description: His administration plans a second round of talks with Iran on Saturday in Rome that few thought possible after years of hostility dating back to the Republican president's first term.
articles.title: With his promises of peace unmet in Gaza and Ukraine, Trump may find Iran just as tough

articles.author: Trevor Hunnicutt
articles.description: Trump's comments further pointed to a diminished appetite for sharply higher across-the-board tariffs on dozens of countries after markets reacted violently to their introduction on April 2.
articles.title: Trump signals tit-for-tat China tariffs may be near end; TikTok deal on ice

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Hamas' Gaza chief said the group was ready to immediately negotiate a deal to swap all hostages for an agreed number of Palestinians jailed by Israel as part of a broader deal to end the war in the enclave.
articles.title: Hamas ready to release all remaining hostages for end to Gaza war, Hamas' Gaza chief says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Multiple people were hospitalized on Thursday after reports of an active shooter at Florida State University and police have taken a suspect into custody, according to media reports.
articles.title: Multiple people hospitalized in shooting at Florida State University

articles.author: Andrew Chung
articles.description: The U.S. Supreme Court said on Thursday it will hear arguments next month over Donald Trump's bid to broadly enforce his executive order to restrict automatic birthright citizenship, a key pillar of the Republican president's hardline approach toward immigration.
articles.title: US Supreme Court to hear Trump bid to enforce birthright citizenship order

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Ukraine said on Thursday that Kyiv and Washington had signed a memorandum as an initial step towards clinching an agreement on developing mineral resources in Ukraine, a deal promoted by U.S. President Donald Trump.
articles.title: US, Ukraine sign memorandum as first step to minerals deal, senior Ukrainian official says
Trump administration orders Gaza-linked social media vetting for visa applicants

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Democratic U.S. Senator Chris Van Hollen said on Thursday he met Kilmar Abrego Garcia, a man wrongly deported to El Salvador by the administration of Republican President Donald Trump.
articles.title: US Senator Van Hollen says he met wrongly deported man in El Salvador

articles.author: Nathan Layne
articles.description: A federal judge granted a preliminary injunction on Thursday that extends a ban on billionaire Elon Musk's aides from accessing private information on millions of Americans held in the Social Security Administration's computer systems.
articles.title: Judge extends ban on Musk's DOGE access to private Social Security data

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Increased imports of U.S. food and commodities by Indonesia would mean lower orders from countries that Indonesia currently buys the products from, chief economic minister Airlangga Hartarto told reporters in Washington.
articles.title: Indonesia says to increase U.S. imports would divert orders from elsewhere
